page.title: 15GUIDE BRIDGE RAILWAY STATION
page.content: Audenshaw C.of E.School is near a railway junction (Guide Bridge).Most of the area is residential but there is some industry and some grass land.We went to Guide Bridge Station and asked some questions. There are about 120 passenger trains and approximately 30 goods trains each day. The trains pass through from Hadfield to Manchester,New Mills to Manchester, and Stalybridge to Stockport. There are no Inter Cities. The rush hours are 7.15 am to 9.00 am and 3.45 pm to 6.45pm. The sidings are used for train repairs.
